Text: Any idea when we're going to get episode 5?

I'd love more episodes of The Burn.
I'm a huge roast fan and I'm really enjoying this series.

Here's hoping, and thank you for the other episodes!!!
While we're at it, I'd really like to see the Jeff Ross Roasts America comedy special.  It seems like roasts are prejudiced against on the pirate scene...

Weird.

The.Burn.S01E01-E04 were all UL'd in a relatively timely manner.

But now it seems we're destined to never see The.Burn.S01E05 or The.Burn.S01E06, the final two eps of the season.

Weird.
